title: Poster, "Richard Sapper Design", 1993
signed: Imprinted (sideways) in gray, lower right quadrant:  Design, Paul Rand
description: An exhibition poster for the designer Richard Sapper.  Silhouetted in white on black ground, three [?] Tizio lamps, overlapping and in different positions.  Imprinted in upper quarter of sheet, the exhibition title, in gray: "Richard Sapper Design."  Along lower edge, the museum where the exhibition is showing (Museum fur Kunst und Gewerbe Hamburg), the exhibition dates and open hours, and announcement that the Museum also houses the Raymond Loewy Collection of Industrial Design.  In lower right corner, a red circle bordered in white and green (Museum logo?).

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "Richard Sapper Design", 1993.
1993. Offset lithograph. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-25.
